snippet.title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS - A Hero's Journey Trailer
snippet.description:
Legendary hero Zhuge Liang wanders ancient China searching for a worthy master in the latest Total War: THREE KINGDOMS cinematic. A stunning showcase of the varied land your dynasty could stretch across.

Get the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/779340/Total_War_THREE_KINGDOMS/

For all the latest info, follow us on social media:
➤http://www.facebook.com/totalwar
➤http://www.twitter.com/totalwar
➤http://www.instagram.com/totalwarofficial
➤http://www.twitch.tv/totalwarofficial


Video type: Cinematic Trailer
What does this mean? Full info here: ➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
